name: Dreenshar: Dzieło Magów
overview: Dreenshar: Dzieło Magów is a dungeon crawler RPG. As a humanoid creature created by magicians gathering moments before their death, the player must save the city from the forces of chaos. Character creation includes selections from ten races and ten classes available. The game's protagonist is described by three primary (strength, stamina and magic) and three secondary (attack, defense, level of experience) factors, and may be equipped with various clothes, weapons, belts, magical potions. The gameplay screen is divided into environment window, options panel, direction arrows and dialog box. The game features built in level map.
